data.title: Official Website
data.text:
Welcome to Danbury, Connecticut!

As the 32nd Mayor of the City of Danbury, I'd like to welcome you to the City of Danbury website. This website serves as a resource for the residents of Danbury to access all of the information they may need.

Danbury is a thriving and diverse city located in Western Connecticut, that focuses on preserving and providing a superior quality of life for our residents and stakeholders through implementation of efficient and effective municipal services.

To contact my office, please call 203-797-4511

Mayor Roberto L. Alves
